name: SPIKERUST
description:
• Climb up through the rusted shaft.
  • Throw your hook and chain to avoid the spikes and red flies.
  • Renew your energy by catching the green flies.

Rustspike is a simple endless climber game inspired by the roguelike game Caves of Qud.

It was created in a couple of days as a submission for the Outfit7 Talent Camp 2018 selection process.
